bug.author: agonzalezd
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I just installed streamlit from pip: python3 -m pip install streamlit and executed the command streamlit hello to get this error: TypeError: descriptor '__subclasses__' of 'type' object needs an argument <denchmark-h:h2>Full Traceback</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/bin/streamlit", line 7, in <module> from streamlit.cli import main File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/streamlit/__init__.py", line 97, in <module> from streamlit.DeltaGenerator import DeltaGenerator as _DeltaGenerator File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 28, in <module> import pandas as pd File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/__init__.py", line 55, in <module> from pandas.core.api import ( File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/api.py", line 5, in <module> from pandas.core.arrays.integer import ( File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/arrays/__init__.py", line 1, in <module> from .array_ import array # noqa: F401 File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/arrays/array_.py", line 7, in <module> from pandas.core.dtypes.common import ( File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/common.py", line 11, in <module> from pandas.core.dtypes.dtypes import ( File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/dtypes.py", line 53, in <module> class Registry: File "/home/${USER_PATH}/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/dtypes.py", line 84, in Registry self, dtype: Union[Type[ExtensionDtype], str] File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 552, in __getitem__ dict(self.__dict__), parameters, _root=True) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 512, in __new__ for t2 in all_params - {t1} if not isinstance(t2, TypeVar)): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 512, in <genexpr> for t2 in all_params - {t1} if not isinstance(t2, TypeVar)): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 1077, in __subclasscheck__ if super().__subclasscheck__(cls): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/abc.py", line 225, in __subclasscheck__ for scls in cls.__subclasses__(): TypeError: descriptor '__subclasses__' of 'type' object needs an argument </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: streamlit==0.50.2 Python version: 3.5.2 Plain Python OS version: Ubuntu 16.04
Tried with & without sudo

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/agonzalezd>@agonzalezd</denchmark-link> , It seems to be related to this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/python/typing/issues/266>issue</denchmark-link> , try upgrading your python version.

Closing for now since this doesn't look like a Streamlit bug. Hopefully the issue was resolved for you by updating your python version. Feel free to reopen if you have reason to believe this is not right!
Yes, this bug was fixed by updating the Python version to 3.6 I found somewhere that Streamlit requires at least 3.6, although it is not easy to find, at least for me. Thanks for your replies!
